mapper.select: select distinct device ,custom_code from vtdatester.bin_wafer_summary where custom_code in (SELECT distinct custom_code FROM vtdaprober.bin_wafer_summary);
select distinct lot_id,cp_step from vtdatester.bin_wafer_summary where device=#{device} and custom_code=#{custom};
SELECT wafer_no FROM vtdatester.bin_wafer_summary where custom_code=#{custom} and device=#{device} and lot_id=#{lot} and cp_step=#{cp};
SELECT wafer_no,gross_die,pass_die,fail_die,yield FROM vtdatester.bin_wafer_summary WHERE custom_code=#{custom} AND device =#{device} AND lot_id=#{lot} AND cp_step=#{cp};
